name: LionsFan
0:
”Alexa, open Lions fan.”
”Alexa, ask Lions fan for a flash briefing on the Lions.”
”Alexa, ask Lions fan about the previous game score.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lions fan
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get unofficial to-the-minute stats & fun facts on the Lions by Fresh Digital Group. This skill isn’t sponsored or endorsed by the Lions.

Here’s some ways you can use the skill. We have given you many different ways for you to talk to Alexa:



General Updates:


Alexa, ask Lions Fan how are the Lions doing? 

Alexa, ask Lions Fan who do the Lions play next?

Alexa, ask Lions Fan Matthew Stafford (or any player's First name, Last name) touchdown update. 



Fun Facts about the Lions:


Alexa, ask Lions Fan to tell me some trivia about the Lions. 

Alexa, ask Lions Fan how many Super Bowls have the Lions won?
